title: PixVerse Joins UNU Global AI Network to Launch "AI for Good Academy"
description: SINGAPORE, Oct. 30, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Recently, the United Nations University Institute successfully hosted the Artificial Intelligence Conference. During the event, Generative AI video platform, PixVerse officially joined the United Nations University Global AI Network (UNU Global AI Network) and, together with the Network, launched the 'AI for Good Academy.'

title: Samsung Electronics' Net Profit Shoots Up 21% With The Chip Segment Posting Record Performance Amid The Artificial Intelligence Industry Boom
description: Net profit came to 12.22 trillion won ($8.6 billion) in the July-September period, up 21 per cent from the 10.1 trillion won tallied a year earlier, the company said in a regulatory filing.
content: Seoul: Samsung Electronics on Thursday said its net profit shot up 21 per cent in the third quarter from a year earlier with the chip segment posting a record performance amid the artificial intelligence (AI) industry boom. Net profit came to 12.22 t... [2681 chars]

title: YouTube will use AI to sharpen lower-resolution videos
description: Google's YouTube will use artificial intelligence to improve the visual clarity of many low-resolution videos on its platform when viewed on TV screens, the web and mobile devices.
content:
Google’s YouTube will use artificial intelligence to improve the visual clarity of many low-resolution videos on its platform when viewed on TV screens, the web and mobile devices.

title: Amazon job cull shows the darker side of artificial intelligence
description: Having invested hugely in AI, companies are now looking for a dividend in terms of lower costs to keep shareholders happy
content:
Another week, another job announcement. But this one was the type we prefer not to see: a cull of thousands of jobs at tech giant Amazon.

title: OpenAI Might Head for One of History’s Biggest IPOs at $1 Trillion Valuation: Report
description: OpenAI is preparing for an initial public offering that could value the artificial intelligence pioneer at up to $1 trillion, Reuters reported. If realised, the offering would rank among the largest IPOs in history.

title: Zuckerberg Admits AI Boom Could Be a “Bubble,” But Says Meta Won’t Slow Down
description: Mark Zuckerberg acknowledged the risk of an AI "bubble," but committed Meta to massive spending on Artificial Intelligence infrastructure, including the construction of data centers for superintelligence.
content: Nothing can budge Zuckerberg’s decision to spend billions on Artificial Intelligence (AI), not even the fact that AI is a bubble that could burst one day. Zuckerberg himself knows this. The 41-year-old CEO of Meta, while speaking on a podcast, has ad... [2459 chars]

title: What AI Brings to the Veterinary Industry in 2026
description: The veterinary industry is entering a new era in 2026.
